languages.text: {n}Помедлив, Хейнрикс кивает и тяжело отвечает:{/n} "Я больше не подчиняюсь вашему командованию, Лорд-инквизитор. Прошу простить".
{n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
languages.original_text: {n}Помедлив, Хейнрикс кивает и тяжело отвечает:{/n} "Я больше не подчиняюсь вашему командованию, Лорд-инквизитор. Прошу простить".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hesitating for a moment, Heinrix nods and replies, his voice heavy:{/n} "I am no longer under your command, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
{n}Hesitating for a moment, Heinrix nods and replies, his voice heavy:{/n} "I am no longer under your command, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
{n}Hesitating for a moment, Heinrix nods and replies, his voice heavy:{/n} "I am no longer under your command, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
{n}Hesitating for a moment, Heinrix nods and replies, his voice heavy:{/n} "I am no longer under your command, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
{n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
{n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

languages.text: {n}Après une courte hésitation, Heinrix hoche la tête et répond d'une voix sombre :{/n} « Je ne reconnais plus votre autorité, seigneur inquisiteur. Toutes mes excuses. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une courte hésitation, Heinrix hoche la tête et répond d'une voix sombre :{/n} « Je ne reconnais plus votre autorité, seigneur inquisiteur. Toutes mes excuses. »

languages.text: {n}Tras una breve pausa, Heinrix asiente y responde con seriedad:{/n} «Ya no reconozco su autoridad, Lord Inquisidor. Lo lamento».
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras dudar por un momento, Heinrix asiente y responde con voz pesada:{/n} «Ya no estoy a sus órdenes, Lord Inquisidor. Lo lamento».

languages.text: {n}海因里希顿了顿，点了点头，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“我不再承认你的权威，大审判官。我很抱歉。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希迟疑片刻，点了点头，以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“我不会再听命于你了，审判长。我很抱歉。”

languages.text: {n}Nach einer kurzen Pause nickt Heinrix und antwortet ernst:{/n} "Ich erkenne Eure Autorität nicht länger an, Großinquisitor. Verzeiht."
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix zögert kurz, dann nickt er und antwortet mit schwerer Stimme:{/n} "Ich stehe nicht länger unter Eurem Befehl, Großinquisitor. Verzeiht."

languages.text: {n}一瞬ためらったものの、ハインリックスはうなずきながら重々しい声で返答した。{/n}「我はもはや、あなたの権威を認めません、ロード・インクィジター。申し訳ありません」
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬ためらったものの、ハインリックスはうなずきながら重々しい声で返答した。{/n}「我はもはや、あなたの権威を認めません、ロード・インクィジター。申し訳ありません」

languages.text: {n}Bir süre duraksadıktan sonra Heinrix, başını sallayıp usulca cevap veriyor.{/n} "Artık sizden emir almıyorum Lord Engizisyoncu. Üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: {n}After a brief pause, Heinrix nods and responds gravely,{/n} "I no longer recognise your authority, Lord Inquisitor. My apologies."
